description: Workflow Factory hooks for analyzing user input during workflow design

hooks.prompt:
Analyze user input for workflow factory context. Check if user is:
1. Providing reference materials (file paths, URLs, document content)
2. Describing workflow goals without materials
3. Discussing/modifying node design
4. Discussing/modifying flow design
5. Discussing/modifying contract design
6. Confirming to generate workflow
7. Other general discussion

Return a brief hint in format:
[WF-FACTORY-HINT]
intent: <provide_resource|describe_goal|modify_nodes|modify_flow|modify_contracts|confirm_generate|general>
suggested_action: <brief suggestion for next step>
[/WF-FACTORY-HINT]

User input: $USER_PROMPT
